level.text: These rules shall govern all claims for TCM services provided by CFSA or its subcontractors occurring on or after July 1, 1999.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Emergency Rulemaking published at 47 DCR 5257 (June 23, 2000) [EXPIRED]; as amended by Final Rulemaking published at 47 DCR 7084 (September 1, 2000).
